Subscription.Description: Application crashes, hangs and error reporting logs.
Subscription.Query: <QueryList> <Query Id="0" Path="Application"> <Select Path="Application">*[System[Provider[@Name='MsiInstaller'] and (EventID=1022 or EventID=1033)]]</Select> <Select Path="Setup">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Servicing'] and EventID=2 and Level=0]] and *[UserData[CbsPackageChangeState[IntendedPackageState='Installed']]] </Select> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Application-Experience/Program-Inventory">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Application-Experience'] and (EventID=903 or EventID=904)]]</Select> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Application-Experience/Program-Inventory">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Application-Experience'] and (EventID=905 or EventID=906)]]</Select> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Application-Experience/Program-Inventory">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Application-Experience'] and (EventID=907 or EventID=908)]]</Select> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Application-Experience/Program-Inventory">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Application-Experience'] and EventID=800]]</Select> </Query> <Query Id="1" Path="OAlerts"> <Select Path="OAlerts">*</Select> </Query> <Query Id="2" Path="System"> <Select Path="System">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Kernel-General'] and (EventID=12 or EventID=13)]]</Select> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4608)]]</Select> </Query> <Query Id="3" Path="System"> <Select Path="System">*[System[Provider[@Name='USER32'] and (EventID=1074)]]</Select> </Query> <Query Id="4" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4817 or EventID=4826)]]</Select> </Query> </QueryList>
